forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 58. North wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
This morning in Boston greets us with brilliant sunshine, painting an inviting canvas of blue overhead, unmarred by clouds or fog. The air carries the gentle whisper of a north wind, crisp yet mild, which promises to keep the atmosphere refreshingly pleasant throughout the day. As the sun ascends, it warms the city to a comfortable high near 77, making it an exquisite day to venture outdoors. 

As the sun begins its descent this evening, the sky will softly transition to a partly cloudy tableau, with temperatures dipping gracefully to around 58. For those pondering how to dress, light layers will serve well; think airy shirts complemented by a light sweater for later in the day, should the evening air turn nippy. The allure of this day also beckons for simple pleasures—perhaps a leisurely stroll along the riverbanks, enjoying the vibrant life around you, or an early dinner at an outdoor café to soak in the ambiance before nightfall draw its curtain. Embrace the day and its gentle warmth; let its peaceful rhythm guide your moments.
